meanings.definition: A unit of capacity equal to one thousandth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: I poured one millilitre of water into the cup.
meanings.sent2: The medicine bottle contains 10 millilitres of liquid.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled a millilitre of milk on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a precious millilitre of perfume in a vast room.
meanings.sent5: The tiny millilitre of oil in the engine kept it running smoothly.

meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to one cubic centimeter.
meanings.sent1: The syringe can hold up to one millilitre of medicine.
meanings.sent2: The small bottle only had a few millilitres of ink left.
meanings.sent3: He joked that a millilitre of soda was all he needed to quench his thirst.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room was like a millilitre of perfume in a large bottle.
meanings.sent5: She carefully measured each millilitre of paint for the art project.
